name: Wikipedia DarkGray
description: Simple reading style for Wikipedia and other Wikimedia sites.
additional_info:
This style was originally based on 'simple research': http://userstyles.org/styles/3424/wikipedia-simple-research

It is mainly intended for Wikipedia.org but is affecting several other sister sites. If you don't want this, comment or delete the additional domains.
